This ZIP-File contains three annontation-files:

- testset_GT_annotations.txt
- trainset_gt_annotations_original.txt
- trainset_gt_annotations_corrected.txt

The annotation-file named "original" contains an error within the male/female concept. 
It is included in order to replicate the original data.
In the file named "corrected" this error has been resolved.
This error affected the trainingset only, hence there is only on annotation-file for the testset.
